text: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy wealthy and wise
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: The greatest wealth is Health.
author: Unknown

text: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food
author: Hippocrates

text: Just because you're not sick doesn't mean you're healthy
author: Author Unknown

text: Those who think they have no time for exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
author: Edward Stanley

text: If you don't take care of your body, where are you going to live?
author: Unknown

text: Healthy is merely the slowest rate at which one can die.
author: Unknown

text: Garbage in garbage out
author: George Fuechsel

text: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
author: Doug Larson

text: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

text: If you can't pronounce it, don't eat it
author: Common sense

text: In order to change we must be sick and tired of being sick and tired.
author: Author Unknown

text: Health is like money, we never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.
author: Josh Billings

text: Time And health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
author: Denis Waitley

text: From the bitterness of disease man learns the sweetness of health.
author: Catalan Proverb

text: Health and cheerfulness naturally beget each other.
author: Joseph Addison

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
author: Astrid Alauda

text: Mainstream medicine would be way different if they focused on prevention even half as much as they focused on intervention...
author: Anonymous

text: Our bodies are our gardens - our wills are our gardeners.
author: William Shakespeare

text: The best and most efficient pharmacy is within your own system.
author: Robert C. Peale

text: Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
author: Hannah Green

text: My own prescription for health is less paperwork and more running barefoot through the grass
author: Leslie Grimutter

text: The more you eat, the less flavor; the less you eat, the more flavor.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: The best doctor gives the least medicine.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The doctor of the future will no longer treat the human frame with drugs, but rather will cure and prevent disease with nutrition.
author: Thomas Edison

text: An apple a day keeps the doctor away
author: Proverb

text: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, but a broken spirit dries the bones..
author: Proverb

text: True healthcare reform starts in your kitchen, not in Washington
author: Anonymous

text: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
author: Mark Twain

text: To insure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
author: William Londen

text: A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
author: Spanish Proverb

text: To keep the body in good health is a duty, for otherwise we shall not be able to trim the lamp of wisdom, and keep our mind strong and clear. Water surrounds the lotus flower, but does not wet its petals.
author: Buddha

text: Now there are more overweight people in America than average-weight people. So overweight people are now average. Which means you've met your New Year's resolution.
author: Jay Leno

text: Don’t eat anything your great-great grandmother wouldn’t recognize as food. There are a great many food-like items in the supermarket your ancestors wouldn’t recognize as food.. stay away from these
author: Michael Pollan

text: Health is a relationship between you and your body
author: Terri Guillemets

text: He who takes medicine and neglects to diet wastes the skill of his doctors.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Sickness comes on horseback but departs on foot.
author: Dutch Proverb

text: Diseases of the soul are more dangerous and more numerous than those of the body.
author: Cicero

text: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor's book.
author: Irish Proverb

text: Water, air and cleanliness are the chief articles in my pharmacopoeia.
author: Napoleon I

text: The 'i' in illness is isolation, and the crucial letters in wellness is 'we'.
author: Author Unknown

text: Health of body and mind is a great blessing, if we can bear it.
author: John Henry Cardinal Newman

text: Today, more than 95% of all chronic disease is caused by food choice, toxic food ingredients, nutritional deficiencies and lack of physical exercise.
author: Mike Adams

text: It's bizarre that the produce manager is more important to my children's health than the pediatrician.
author: Meryl Streep

text: Healing in a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
author: Hippocrates

text: The part can never be well unless the whole is well.
author: Plato

text: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die.
author: Author Unknown

text: By cleansing your body on a regular basis and eliminating as many toxins as possible from your environment, your body can begin to heal itself, prevent disease, and become stronger and more resilient than you ever dreamed possible!
author: Dr. Edward Group III
